title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง 8.5 - Transportation by state-owned vehicle
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง 8.5 - Transportation by state-owned vehicle

State Regulations

If a traveler uses a State-owned vehicle, it should be
indicated on the voucher. Garage and parking charges, and tolls will be
reimbursed. Auto emergency supply items will be reimbursed only if documented
by appropriate receipt attached to the travel voucher. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง
8.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
